ProjectList.Name: DMR.NET
ProjectList.Description: DMR.NET is a nuget package designed to help developers interact with the data provided by the Danish Vehicle Registry (DMR). Its primary goal is to provide the logic for downloading and parsing DMR data, enabling developers to create their own services that can ingest this data and store it in their own databases for faster retrieval and processing.

ProjectList.Name: DMR2Mongo
ProjectList.Description: DMR2Mongo is a simple service that checks for updates to the Danish Vehicle Registry (DMR) database, downloads the latest available data, parses the objects, and stores them in a MongoDB database.

ProjectList.Name: KanbanCord
ProjectList.Description: KanbanCord is a Discord bot that brings Kanban boards to your server, enabling efficient task management and seamless team collaboration.

ProjectList.Name: Notam Management
ProjectList.Description: The Notam Management Project, developed in collaboration with AIRSUPPORT A/S, is part of the final exam for the Computer Science program. The project focuses on streamlining the management and handling of NOTAMs (Notice to Airmen) to improve aviation safety and operational efficiency.

ProjectList.Name: dmr.py
ProjectList.Description: dmr.py is a python package that allows you to look up Danish license plates by scraping the danish vehicle registry directly, eliminating the need for a paid API. This project may no longer be maintained.

ProjectList.Name: Bump Buddy
ProjectList.Description: Bump Buddy is a Discord bot that automates server bump reminders to help maintain visibility on discovery lists. Used by over 20,000 servers, it sends customizable notifications to ensure servers stay at the top and grow their community.

ProjectList.Name: Guildy
ProjectList.Description: Guildy is a Danish Discord bot used by over 400 servers, making it one of the largest Danish Discord bots. It’s a multi-purpose bot with a wide range of features designed to enhance server management and user experience.

ProjectList.Name: Korterelink
ProjectList.Description: Korterelink is a URL shortener service with browser addons for quickly creating short URLs. The project is still running, but it has not been updated in a while.

ProjectList.Name: Jazper.dk
ProjectList.Description: This website. Jazper.dk is the personal website I’ve built to showcase my work and projects. This site is developed using MudBlazor.

ProjectList.Name: FlightRadar
ProjectList.Description: An unofficial FlightRadar24 API wrapper designed to provide easy and efficient access to the FlightRadar24 data. This is available as a NuGet package.

ExperienceList.Name: Student Software Developer @ AIR SUPPORT A/S
ExperienceList.Description: As a student developer, my primary responsibilities included updating projects running older versions of .NET, fixing bugs, and implementing optimizations—tasks that typically had no set deadlines.

ExperienceList.Name: Intern @ AIR SUPPORT A/S
ExperienceList.Description: I began as an intern during my Computer Science studies, where I primarily worked on an internal site, developing tools for developers and support teams.

ExperienceList.Name: Computer Science Student @ UCL University College Lillebaelt
ExperienceList.Description: As a computer science student, we have learned basic programming in C#, Microsoft SQL databases, basic networking, and technologies such as Docker. In my 4th semester, I chose to specialize in offensive penetration testing and Kubernetes.
